name: dch_at_continuation
description: DCH at the continuation cell of a wide char should clean up the orphaned head
comment: Print A, 中 (wide: cols 1-2), BC. CUP(1,3) → cursor at (0,2) the continuation cell. DCH 1 deletes (0,2), shifts left. The wide char head at (0,1) loses its continuation and is cleaned up.
